name: Flow Bridged PYUSD (Flow)
description: Flow Bridged PYUSD (Flow) is a bridged PYUSD deployed by Flow Foundation on Flow blockchain from Solana/Ethereum through LayerZero. [Flow](https://flow.com/) is a layer one blockchain designed from the ground up for consumer apps and the digital assets that power them. The network runs on a Proof of Stake consensus mechanism with a unique "multi-role" architecture that solves the blockchain trilemma, balancing scalability, efficiency, and cost.
